title: Erigon v2.35.0 and above crashes with SIGILL illegal insruction
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: v2.36.1

OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash :  28aca475f26216884f86112a8cc3ee9b01504752

built docker image locally with:
`DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build .`

#### Expected behaviour
erigon starts normally without crash


#### Actual behaviour
erigon crashes with SIGILL illegal instruction
**NOTE**: this doesn't happen on v2.30.0


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Started erigon with:

```
   "--chain=mainnet",
            "--datadir",
            "/mnt/ethereum/mainnet",
            "--http",
            "--http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool,engine",
            "--http.addr",
            "0.0.0.0",
            "--ws",
            "--torrent.upload.rate=1mb",
            "--torrent.download.rate=1mb"
```
